Articles.Content:
If I switch to Steam, can I still use mods normally?

Yes, you can (well, not necessarily right now because update, but that's no different than from the store).

200th reply, and the download has resumed. Things looking up, a little.

Please don't post your adventures in 0.24, I can't stop looking at them and it is irritating me.

WOOOoooOOOOOoooOOOO!

Took about 12 tries because the download button kept giving me a blank white page, but it's finally trickling in! Now to cross my fingers it doesn't do what it seems to be doing to some of you guys and quitting partway through ^^;

I'm aware of that, will have to rework the template for the opening post for the next update. The changelog is also available in the readme.txt that comes with 0.24 and through an article on the main page

Thanks Kasper, reading it now. Not trying to add to your workload on an already busy day.

Can anyone help me? Maybe I am too stupid, but I am unable to rescue Matbles Kerman. I launched a vessel with room for two, made my approach until I was only 0.6m away from him. But then I can't control him in any way. I just get the message "Cannot switch to an object we do not own". I am right next to him, but he's just floatin' around :-(. The contract is still active. What to do?

Im i the only who has got some pretty weird and stupid contracts like i had one where i was supoustu tried baac booster in 24 100-27 000 meters. Like wtf booster are supousto help me in the early stags of launch. Another one was to use sepatron in 3 000-7 000 while traveling 320 meters per second. I achieved to do both but still those were bit weird and when trying to do meny contracts as possible per flight so i could save money it is pretty hard.

Anybody else having a staging problem? I need to hit spacebar a few times before it'll start staging. Don't know if it's a game problem, or a problem with my 8 year old keyboard. Come to think of it, I believe this thing has 'ingested' a few cups of coffee over the years. It's probably the keyboard.

I've been desperately trying to download .24 for Linux but keep getting the White Screen Of Death...

I know the servers are melting but please, please, please, please....

I declare Line 132 guilty of treason to KSP

I sentence Line 132, and anyone who sold it bacon to death. It's family will be sentenced to hard labor!

Line 9 and Line 11 will also join Line 132 on this punishment! They are to die!

Anybody else having a staging problem? I need to hit spacebar a few times before it'll start staging. Don't know if it's a game problem, or a problem with my 8 year old keyboard. Come to think of it, I believe this thing has 'ingested' a few cups of coffee over the years. It's probably the keyboard.

I wouldn't be too hasty blaming the keyboard. I had the exact same thing happen a couple times and I figured I perhaps missed the spacebar a little bit. I'm now beginning to doubt that

7GB! (so glad i have 16GB in this system)

unfortunately with all my mods the game crashes (hence the 2 next to ksp) when i try to make a new save (assess violation whatever that is)

and i cant seem to change chrome tabs when ksp is running

http://i.imgur.com/git6zWy.png

http://imgur.com/D59jKB5

Can anyone help me? Maybe I am too stupid, but I am unable to rescue Matbles Kerman. I launched a vessel with room for two, made my approach until I was only 0.6m away from him. But then I can't control him in any way. I just get the message "Cannot switch to an object we do not own". I am right next to him, but he's just floatin' around :-(. The contract is still active. What to do?

http://desertfox.bestpony.de/ksp.png

You need to use the [ and ] keys to switch active vessels, if you don't have room for 2 though, it probably won't do much good.

I wouldn't be too hasty blaming the keyboard. I had the exact same thing happen a couple times and I figured I perhaps missed the spacebar a little bit. I'm now beginning to doubt that

I have also noticed that the game sometimes ignores my spacebar press, no idea why though.
2 bugs before I even got to orbit(.23.5 sandbox) Otherwise great. I like that the pricing isn't exclusive to career.

Dammit Squad... Just as I was about to start my brand new Duna mission...

Also, is it me or are the update promo videos TV-show worthy? I mean, come on- how many of you wouldn't pay to see the daily exploits of Jeb & Cie...

http://i.imgur.com/BShao1K.png

7GB! (so glad i have 16GB in this system)

unfortunately with all my mods the game crashes (hence the 2 next to ksp) when i try to make a new save (assess violation whatever that is)

and i cant seem to change chrome tabs when ksp is running

http://i.imgur.com/git6zWy.png

http://imgur.com/D59jKB5

Wow, that is a lot of mods

But the access violation messages always appeared when you ran out of RAM. This is a strange issue indeed...
enjoy 64bits everyone. Steve jobs made my computer so baller I don't even need that many
I think something's a bit overloaded. I get a link to multiplay.co.uk, which does nothing. Guess no 0.24 for me today..

enjoy 64bits everyone. Steve jobs made my computer so baller I don't even need that many

Obvious troll is obvious. that said please dont try to start a Mac vs PC war here.

apparently sarcasm is that obvious

I think something's a bit overloaded. I get a link to multiplay.co.uk, which does nothing. Guess no 0.24 for me today..

change co.uk to .com and it should work

well using active texture manger i get to around 4.1 GB and it works so that rules out the seeing over 4gb thing

maby there is a unity defined limit?

Strange.. Every time I exit kerbal my left mouse button acts like the right mouse button.. I have to click the right mouse button to get the left button to stop glitching.. I've tried two mice.. Same issue.

Strange.. Every time I exit kerbal my left mouse button acts like the right mouse button.. I have to click the right mouse button to get the left button to stop glitching.. I've tried two mice.. Same issue.

HarvestR has confirmed that is a bug with the 64-bit unity platform
